name: part_003
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Flare and Nene talk backstage before the song transition.
Flare and Watame perform the song 'Rettou Joutou'.

subtitles.english: It's no fun just watching from above.

subtitles.original: ほらもっと　間違って上等
subtitles.english: Hey, more mistakes are fine!

subtitles.original: 退屈に手をかけて

subtitles.original: ママ、やっぱ私　こんなところじゃ終われない
subtitles.english: Mama, as I thought, I can't end in a place like this.

subtitles.original: ぬるくて気が触れそう
subtitles.english: It's so lukewarm, I'm going crazy.

subtitles.original: ごっこ遊びも芝居もさよなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye to make-believe and acting.

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままなんてさ
subtitles.english: Staying like this forever is...

subtitles.original: いらないよ
subtitles.english: not what I want.

subtitles.original: ダッダッダ　あたし大人になる
subtitles.english: Da-da-da, I'm going to become an adult.

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも噛み分けて今
subtitles.english: Experiencing the bitter and the sweet now.

subtitles.original: パッパッパ　変わる時代
subtitles.english: Pa-pa-pa, the changing times.

subtitles.original: 悪いことばかりじゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: It's not all bad, is it?

subtitles.original: 過去も　罪も　罰も　すべて
subtitles.english: The past, the sins, the punishments, everything.

subtitles.original: 素手で　愛で　生き抜いて　覆すわ
subtitles.english: With bare hands and love, I'll survive and overturn it.

subtitles.original: HA 超 HOT　私たちはNO DOUBT
subtitles.english: Ha, super hot, we are no doubt.

subtitles.original: 緑のあいつにバカ構ってんね
subtitles.english: Don't bother with that green guy.

subtitles.original: サボ　あいつになったら貰える合格
subtitles.english: Skip it, you'll pass if you become that guy.

subtitles.original: 赤ペン入れてよどこがダメなんですか
subtitles.english: Mark it with a red pen, tell me what's wrong.

subtitles.original: 酒、女、金、じゃやってコンプラ
subtitles.english: Alcohol, women, money, that's the compliance.

subtitles.original: 知るかよ　あーあ
subtitles.english: I don't care, ah well.

subtitles.original: 冗談じゃバカしちゃう
subtitles.english: Don't kid me, I'll go crazy.

subtitles.original: 中指立てたくなるような事情ありすぎて指が足りねぇからハンズアップ
subtitles.english: Too many reasons to give the finger, not enough fingers, so hands up.

subtitles.original: AND WHAT'S UP　最低？　もともとだろ
subtitles.english: And what's up? The worst? I've always been.

subtitles.original: BRING IT ON!
subtitles.english: Bring it on!

subtitles.original: ママ、何回だって
subtitles.english: Mama, no matter how many times,

subtitles.original: 欲しがります死ぬまでは
subtitles.english: I'll keep wanting until I die.

subtitles.original: 伸びた背丈　育った街に投げキス
subtitles.english: Taller now, a blown kiss to the town where I grew up.

subtitles.original: 見せ場はこっから
subtitles.english: The highlight starts here.

subtitles.original: 覚悟しとけよ
subtitles.english: Be prepared.

subtitles.original: ダッダッダ　僕ら大人になる
subtitles.english: Da-da-da, we're going to become adults.

subtitles.original: 数え切れない最低な日々に
subtitles.english: In these countless terrible days.

subtitles.original: 淡々と　かます一撃
subtitles.english: A cool, calculated strike.

subtitles.original: 誰も読めない先まで行こうぜ、ほら
subtitles.english: Let's go further than anyone can predict, come on!

subtitles.original: 過去も　罪も　罰も　すべて
subtitles.english: The past, the sins, the punishments, everything.

subtitles.original: 素手で　愛で　生き抜いて　覆すわ
subtitles.english: With bare hands and love, I'll survive and overturn it.

subtitles.original: ダッダッダ　くだらない
subtitles.english: Da-da-da, it's trivial.

subtitles.original: ことばっか譲れない
subtitles.english: I won't give in on these things.

subtitles.original: わかるか？　私の美学
subtitles.english: Do you understand? My aesthetics.

subtitles.original: この馬鹿正直な拳ひとつが
subtitles.english: This single, brutally honest fist.

subtitles.original: 一途なんです
subtitles.english: It's single-minded.

subtitles.original: 切り札
subtitles.english: My trump card.

subtitles.original: 愚直なんです
subtitles.english: It's straightforward.

subtitles.original: ガナるレット
subtitles.english: Roaring let...

subtitles.original: 打ち抜けよ
subtitles.english: Shoot through it!

subtitles.original: さらば！
subtitles.english: Farewell!

subtitles.original: こんなもんじゃない！
subtitles.english: It's not just this!

subtitles.original: ダッダッダ　あたし大人になる
subtitles.english: Da-da-da, I'm going to become an adult.

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも噛み分けて今
subtitles.english: Experiencing the bitter and the sweet now.

subtitles.original: 燦々と　交わる未来
subtitles.english: A brilliantly intersecting future.

subtitles.original: 悪いことばかりじゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: It's not all bad, is it?

subtitles.original: 最大級の　馬鹿でいさせて
subtitles.english: Let me be the biggest fool.

subtitles.original: 素手で　攻めて　生き抜いて　上等だわ
subtitles.english: Attacking with bare hands and surviving, it's fine by me.

subtitles.original: AH...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 愛ある時代
subtitles.english: An era with love.

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: それでは皆様お先にバイバイ
subtitles.english: Well then, everyone, bye-bye for now!

subtitles.original: フレアが
subtitles.english: Flare has...

subtitles.original: 湧き上がりましたー！
subtitles.english: ...warmed up!

subtitles.original: ああ、上げた手を下げちゃったよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, I finally put down the hand I held up.

subtitles.original: 上げた手でジャンケンをしちゃったよ。
subtitles.english: I ended up playing rock-paper-scissors with my hand held up.

subtitles.original: 今の最後何だった？
subtitles.english: What was that last one you showed?

subtitles.original: え、グーだよ。
subtitles.english: Uh, it was rock.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ勝ったわ。
subtitles.english: Oh, then I won.

subtitles.original: 何だよ！うそーん！今パーだったよ！
subtitles.english: What?! No way! I showed paper just now!

subtitles.original: ジャンケンしてた？
subtitles.english: Wait, were we playing rock-paper-scissors?

subtitles.original: じゃ、せっかくだからジャンケンしとく？
subtitles.english: Well, since we're at it, shall we play?

subtitles.original: ツノまき、ツノまき、ツノまき、ツノまき、ツノまき、ツノまき、
subtitles.english: Tsunomaki, Tsunomaki, Tsunomaki, Tsunomaki, Tsunomaki, Tsunomaki,

subtitles.original: ジャンケンポン！
subtitles.english: Rock-paper-scissors, shoot!

subtitles.original: あいこでしょ！
subtitles.english: A tie! Again!

subtitles.original: いや、今日はありがとね、来てくれて。
subtitles.english: Anyway, thanks for coming today.

subtitles.original: こちらこそ。こんな、お誕生日やん。
subtitles.english: Not at all. It's your birthday after all.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: おめでたー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 呼んでくれて嬉しいんじゃ。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy you invited me.
